00030  * Constructor
00031  */
00032 DataSetHeaderReader::DataSetHeaderReader()
00033 {
00034 }

00036 /*
00037  * Read the names and file offsets for all DataSets associated with a DataGroup.
00038  */
00039 
00040 void DataSetHeaderReader::ReadAllMinimumInfo(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataGroupHeader& dch, u_int32_t dataSetCnt)
00041 {
00042         // Get the first dataSet offset
00043         u_int32_t nextDataSetFilePos = dch.GetDataSetPos();
00044 
00045         for (u_int32_t i = 0; i < dataSetCnt; ++i)
00046         {
00047                 DataSetHeader dph;
00048 
00049                 // Move to the indicated position in the file
00050                 fileStream.seekg(nextDataSetFilePos, std::ios_base::beg);
00051 
00052                 nextDataSetFilePos = ReadMinimumInfo(fileStream, dph);
00053 
00054                 // Add the DataSetHeader to the file header
00055                 dch.AddDataSetHdr(dph);
00056         }
00057 }
00058 
00059 /*
00060  * Read the complete information for all DataSetHeaders associated with a DataGroup.
00061  */
00062 void DataSetHeaderReader::ReadAll(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataGroupHeader& dch, u_int32_t dataSetCnt)
00063 {
00064         // Get the first dataSet offset
00065         u_int32_t nextDataSetFilePos = dch.GetDataSetPos();
00066 
00067         for (u_int32_t i = 0; i < dataSetCnt; ++i)
00068         {
00069                 DataSetHeader dph;
00070 
00071                 // Move to the indicated position in the file
00072                 fileStream.seekg(nextDataSetFilePos, std::ios_base::beg);
00073 
00074                 nextDataSetFilePos = Read(fileStream, dph);
00075 
00076                 // Add the DataSetHeader to the file header
00077                 dch.AddDataSetHdr(dph);
00078         }
00079 }
00080 
00081 /*
00082         * Reads the minimum DataSetHeader information.
00083         */
00084 u_int32_t DataSetHeaderReader::ReadMinimumInfo(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh)
00085 {
00086         ReadDataSetStartFilePos(fileStream, dsh);
00087         ReadDataFilePos(fileStream, dsh);
00088         u_int32_t nextDataSetFilePos = ReadNextDataSetFilePos(fileStream, dsh);
00089         ReadName(fileStream, dsh);
00090         
00091         return nextDataSetFilePos;
00092 }
00093 
00094 /*
00095  * Reads the complete DataSetHeader information.
00096  */
00097 u_int32_t DataSetHeaderReader::Read(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh)
00098 {
00099         ReadDataSetStartFilePos(fileStream, dsh);
00100         ReadDataFilePos(fileStream, dsh);
00101         u_int32_t nextDataSetFilePos = ReadNextDataSetFilePos(fileStream, dsh);
00102         ReadName(fileStream, dsh);
00103         ReadParameters(fileStream, dsh);
00104         ReadColumns(fileStream, dsh);
00105         ReadRowCount(fileStream, dsh);
00106 
00107 //      dph.SetDataStartFilePos(fileStream.tellg());    // set the offset to the start of the data
00108 
00109         return nextDataSetFilePos;
00110 }
00111 
00112 /*
00113  * Read the file position of the start of the DataSet.
00114  */
00115 void DataSetHeaderReader::ReadDataSetStartFilePos(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh)
00116 {
00117         dsh.SetHeaderStartFilePos(fileStream.tellg());
00118 }
00119 
00120 /*
00121  * Read the file position to the start of the data.
00122  */
00123 void DataSetHeaderReader::ReadDataFilePos(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh)
00124 {
00125         dsh.SetDataStartFilePos(FileInput::ReadUInt32(fileStream));
00126 }
00127 
00128 /*
00129  * Read the file position to the next DataSet.
00130  */
00131 u_int32_t DataSetHeaderReader::ReadNextDataSetFilePos(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh)
00132 {
00133         u_int32_t nextDataSetFilePos = FileInput::ReadUInt32(fileStream);
00134         dsh.SetNextSetFilePos(nextDataSetFilePos);
00135         return nextDataSetFilePos;
00136 }
00137 
00138 /*
00139  * Read the DataSetHeader name.
00140  */
00141 void DataSetHeaderReader::ReadName(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh)
00142 {
00143         std::wstring name = FileInput::ReadString16(fileStream);
00144         dsh.SetName(name);
00145 }
00146 
00147 /*
00148  * Read the parameter list (name-value-type).
00149  */
00150 void DataSetHeaderReader::ReadParameters(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh)
00151 {
00152         u_int32_t params = FileInput::ReadUInt32(fileStream);
00153         for (u_int32_t iparam = 0; iparam < params; ++iparam)
00154         {
00155                 const void* mimeValue = 0;
00156                 std::wstring paramName = FileInput::ReadString16(fileStream);
00157                 int32_t mimeSize = FileInput::ReadBlob(fileStream, mimeValue);
00158                 std::wstring paramType = FileInput::ReadString16(fileStream);
00159                 ParameterNameValueType nvt(paramName, (void*)mimeValue, mimeSize, paramType);
00160                 // deleting 'const void*' is undefined, cast it to a char*
00161                 delete[] (char*)mimeValue;
00162                 dsh.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00163         }
00164 }
00165 
00166 /*
00167  * Read column information.
00168  */
00169 void DataSetHeaderReader::ReadColumns(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh)
00170 {
00171         // Read the number of columns
00172         u_int32_t columns = FileInput::ReadUInt32(fileStream);
00173 
00174         for (u_int32_t icol = 0; icol < columns; ++icol)
00175         {
00176                 // Read the name
00177                 std::wstring name = FileInput::ReadString16(fileStream);
00178                 // Read the type
00179                 int8_t type = FileInput::ReadInt8(fileStream);
00180                 // Read the size
00181                 int32_t size = FileInput::ReadInt32(fileStream);
00182 
00183                 dsh.AddColumn(ColumnInfo(name, (DataSetColumnTypes)type, size));
00184         }
00185 }
00186 
00187 /*
00188  * Read the number of rows.
00189  */
00190 void DataSetHeaderReader::ReadRowCount(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh)
00191 {
00192         int32_t numRows = FileInput::ReadInt32(fileStream);
00193         dsh.SetRowCnt(numRows);
00194 }
